activities:
Chicago Administration & Corporate Services, LLC (CACS)performs accounting and administration work for clients of Custom House Administration, Ltd (CHACS) based in Dublin, Ireland.  However, CACS does not contract directly with these clients as its sole client is CHACS. 
 
Perform accounting work for some of their European based clients out of our offices in Chicago.  We handle confidential investor data which is transmitted in digital & hard copy format, as well as all general correspondence between our office and our counterpart in Ireland.  We would also like to include our human resources data.
